item.title: How to run Google Tasks in separate browser tab?
item.description: I’m a fan of Getting Things Done1 methodology and I recommend to read the book of the same title to anyone. I know, it looks like a typical, american corpo bull****, but it’s not! Wheter you’re a busy manager or a father of three - it might help you to manage things you have to do, on time and with less stress. I’ve been trying multiple apps to support this methodology, but eventually I stick to Google Tasks app 2.
